Grammar:    DataElement 5.0
Namespace:  shr.base
Uses:       shr.core

Element: 	Entry
1..1			ShrId
1..1			EntryId

  Element: ShrId
  Value:   id

  Element: EntryId
  Value:   id

Element: 		Entry
1..1			ShrId
1..1			EntryId
1..1			EntryType
1..1    	CreationTime
1..1			LastUpdated

	Element:		ShrId
	Value:			id

	Element:    EntryId
	Value:      id

	Element:		EntryType
	Value:			uri

	Element: 		LastUpdated
	Value:			instant
